formatDescription: PEA (an acronym of Pack Encrypt Authenticate) is the native format of PeaZip, an open source file archiver created by Giorgio Tani.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

internalSignatures.name: PEA Archive
internalSignatures.note:
BOF: Magic 0xEA, 9 bytes include major/minor version which may be desirable to distinguish in the future. Stream Header 0x0000 'POD' 0x00
